Feature: Create a handsome display or get your own game going with this deluxe commemorative set.
Includes 2 bludgers, 1 quaffle, golden snitch (not removable), 16" x 24" quidditch poster, trunk case, and lock & key.
Perfect for potter fans, collectors, and wizards of all ages.
Warning: choking hazard - small parts.  Not for children under 3 yrs.
